brewery.brewery_description:
Our beer wasn’t born from playing it safe. The original Hahn Brewers took a risk to brew a better beer for the greater good of Australia and hands up, we haven’t got it right every time. But we never settled and every mistake we’ve made has fuelled our passion to innovate more and make our beers the best they can be. That spirit of risk-taking is still alive and kicking today – we push the boundaries in everything we do and brew.

Of course, pushing the boundaries isn’t the only thing that gives our beers that unmistakable crisp, dry taste. That also comes from using the latest brewing technology, top grade ingredients and a shedload of patience.

Innovation doesn’t happen when you use old-school tools. It happens when you use the best of modern brewing technology to push the limits of possibility.

The Hahn Brewers don’t skimp on ingredients. We take our time (and a lot of it) to find the finest barley and hops known to mankind. Is that an overstatement? Nope, we stick by it.

The secret sauce in Hahn’s distinct taste isn’t an ingredient at all. It’s an extremely long brewing process. By brewing our beer for longer, we convert more of the natural sugars, resulting in a crisp, dry and delicious beer. It also makes our beer low in carbohydrates, without compromising on flavour. It’s something we like to call The Happy Accident.

The Hahn brewing philosophy is having the passion and courage to make great things happen and never settling even when they do.

venue.venue_name: Surfers Paradise Surf Life Saving Club

beer.beer_description:
HAHN ULTRA CRISP IS NOW - HAHN SUPERDRY GF
Hahn Ultra is changing names to Hahn SuperDry GF.

Same Great Taste – New Look. Hahn SuperDry GF was created using groundbreaking brewing process five years in the making – combining revolutionary brewing technology with the finest ingredients to create a unique ultra crisp ‘SuperDry’ that’s big on refreshment, lower on carbs – and gluten-free!

Hahn SuperDry GF is officially endorsed as certified gluten free by Coeliac Australia making it appropriate for those with coeliac disease or leading a gluten-free lifestyle.

Great Taste. Lower Carb, Gluten Free – How Good

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 75 check-ins with a photo.

user.bio: Beer lover on tour.  Amateur beer wanker not quite anal enough to critique beer as an art

beer.beer_description:
Hahn SuperDry is our original beer, brewed with the best modern techniques using the finest ingredients for a very long time. A painfully long time, some might say. But that’s what brings out its unmistakable crisp and dry taste, so no complaints here. 

Preservative-free and with fewer carbohydrates, Hahn SuperDry is the delicious result of four friends who had the passion and thirst for adventure to brew a better-tasting beer 20 years ago.

Hahn SuperDry lager has low bitterness and a light body with a clean finish for refreshing, easy drinking.

Extended fermentation breaks down even more natural sugars so there are less carbs than other full-strength beers, and it’s clean and crisp on the tongue.

Hahn began in 1987 when four mates decided to follow their passion and brew better tasting beers for the changing tastes of Australian drinkers.

Malt: Pale Lager, Roasted and Speciality Malt

Hops: Hop extract

Yeast: Australian lager

Additions: Cane sugar

user.bio: Transplanted Canadian who lives in the UK. I love beer and the other good things in life.

beer.beer_description:
Hahn SuperDry 3.5 takes slow brewing to the extreme, much like our full-strength original lager. It also has the same full-flavoured, unmistakable crisp dry taste. So what’s the difference between the two? The alcohol content, which in Hahn SuperDry 3.5 is – you guessed it – 3.5%. What we lacked in imagination when it came to the name, we really made up for in taste.

Brewed using the finest pure ingredients, this is a very balanced, full-flavoured refreshing beer with a slight fruity aroma.

Hahn SuperDry 3.5 takes slow brewing to the extreme, delivering a crisp, dry taste with just 3.5% alcohol.

Hahn began in 1987 when four mates decided to follow their passion and brew better tasting beers for the changing tastes of Australian drinkers.

Malt: Pale Lager, Roasted and Speciality Malt

Hops: Hop extract

Yeast: Australian lager

Additions: Cane sugar

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 10 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 3!

beer.beer_description:
You shouldn’t have to sacrifice full flavoured taste when you’re looking to enjoy a less than full strength beer. And thanks to Hahn Premium Light, you don’t have to. We’ve combined the latest brewing techniques with premium natural ingredients to deliver a full flavoured, crisp and refreshing taste, with less alcohol than regular beers.

Hahn Premium Light is a superior tasting liquid that has been passionately brewed using the best of modern technology and the finest natural ingredients. And the satisfying result? A full flavoured, crisp and refreshing taste, with less alcohol than regular beers at just 2.4%.

So whatever else is going on in your life – a demanding job, busy social calendar, contemplating that triathlon – you can still treat yourself to full flavoured refreshment whether you’re out with your mates or enjoying a quiet one at home.

items.checkin_comment: People who try to convince you this is a good beer is like trying to pull the priest off a child, it’s just not happening mate

You shouldn’t have to sacrifice full flavoured taste when you’re looking to enjoy a less than full strength beer. And thanks to Hahn Premium Light, you don’t have to. We’ve combined the latest brewing techniques with premium natural ingredients to deliver a full flavoured, crisp and refreshing taste, with less alcohol than regular beers.

Hahn Premium Light is a superior tasting liquid that has been passionately brewed using the best of modern technology and the finest natural ingredients. And the satisfying result? A full flavoured, crisp and refreshing taste, with less alcohol than regular beers at just 2.4%.

So whatever else is going on in your life – a demanding job, busy social calendar, contemplating that triathlon – you can still treat yourself to full flavoured refreshment whether you’re out with your mates or enjoying a quiet one at home.

HAHN ULTRA CRISP IS NOW - HAHN SUPERDRY GF
Hahn Ultra is changing names to Hahn SuperDry GF.

Same Great Taste – New Look. Hahn SuperDry GF was created using groundbreaking brewing process five years in the making – combining revolutionary brewing technology with the finest ingredients to create a unique ultra crisp ‘SuperDry’ that’s big on refreshment, lower on carbs – and gluten-free!

Hahn SuperDry GF is officially endorsed as certified gluten free by Coeliac Australia making it appropriate for those with coeliac disease or leading a gluten-free lifestyle.

Great Taste. Lower Carb, Gluten Free – How Good
Brewed with pale Australian malted barley and a late gift of Hersbrucker hops.

It took six years of thirsty work by our Hahn brewers to nail this breakthrough brew, full-flavoured beer that’s just 0.2 standard drinks per bottle. With Hahn Ultra, you can make that mid-week beer with mates and the gym the next day minus that dusty feeling. And the best bit? It tastes just like the refreshing beer you’d normally order; crisp and light with a low bitterness and floral hop aroma.

A revolution in beer has arrived with Hahn Ultra – a full-flavoured beer that’s only 0.2 standard drinks per bottle. And when we say full-flavoured, we really mean it. Hahn Ultra combines the best of modern brewing techniques with the finest ingredients. Light and crisp, it’s a delicious brew that’s easy to drink and ridiculously refreshing.

With Hahn Ultra, you get the 0.2 advantage, so you never have to say ‘no’ to beer catch-ups with mates because of things you want to do the next day.

Maybe you’re out at a mid-week gig, planning an early morning gym session or want to pace yourself at a lunch with your work mates. Don’t say cheers with a lemon squash. Instead, get a Hahn Ultra and enjoy a full-flavoured beer without compromising on what you want to achieve later on.

Better things happen when you push the boundaries and never settle. And that’s exactly what the Hahn Brewers have done from the start. We’ve hit a few hurdles along the way but our passion for better brewing never fails us and sometimes we really hit the spot. Take Hahn Radler, a mid-strength lager cut with natural lemon for an extra-refreshing twist. It’s a surprisingly good blend and the ultimate refreshment on a cracking day.

Hahn Radler is a mid-strength lager cut with natural lemon that offers an extra refreshing twist. It’s a surprisingly good blend that you can’t find anywhere else. And, before you say ‘Hold on, that’s just a shandy!’ here’s the backstory to this unique brew.

Radler is a traditional Bavarian beer and the inspiration behind this refreshing brew. The story goes that a German tavern owner back in the day built a path to his pub for cyclists so they could refresh themselves after a ride. Rider. Radler. You get the link.

With less than 1g carbs and 87 calories per 330mL bottle serve, Hahn Ultra is our most impressive low carb beer to date. Made with simple ingredients that are brewed for longer than the rest of the Hahn range, it’s the perfect balance of flavour and easy drinking crispness that has had as many carbs as possible removed.  It’s made for those who want to enjoy the taste of beer, but don’t want to blow out on carbs and calories.  Great Taste. Ultra Low Carb – How Good
A deep red ale with complex toffee an spicy fruit characteristics
Per label: bottle conditioned for 3 years with a sparkling wine yeast.

Hahn has created this vintage Millennium Ale as a unique celebration of Australia's brewing heritage. Primary fermentation with a European ale yeast has been supplemented by a secondary fermentation in the bottle over time.
Reddish brown toasted malt lager. Floral hop aroma, medium bodied. Light, sweet, caramel notes. Fresh grassy hop character. Soft malt finish. Well balanced.
Classic Pale Ale brewed with local pale malts and a balanced fusion of flavour and aroma hops
